briefTitle: Regenerative Tissue Matrix for Breast Reconstruction
officialTitle: In Situ Elasticity of Alloderm® in Breast Reconstruction
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Develop a mathematical model of the in situ stretch parameters of Alloderm® tissue matrix when used in breast reconstruction.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Inclusion of all females from ages 18 and older who undergoing prosthetic breast reconstruction and will require alloderm for lower pole reconstruction.-

Exclusion Criteria:

Exclusion criteria include perioperative radiation. History of allergic reaction to the allograft or its components or the metallic clips.
